# cm003 - October 3, 2016

## Overview

* Define *exploratory data analysis* (EDA) and types of pattern exploration
* Explain the basic operations for data transformation
* Demonstrate the value added by graphics compared to numeric statistical measures
* Demonstrate types of graphs useful for EDA and precautions when interpreting them
* Introduce `RMarkdown` as a format for creating reproducible research
